Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a possible door problem on train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Chicago due to a possible door problem on train. 

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
